%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW source_reference_grouped

    AS

SELECT id,
value


FROM odw_standardised_db.checkmark_source_reference
Where id is not null
GROUP BY id,value

# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (checkmark) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.comment_fact)
- **New Data:** where a SourceID in the source does not exist as an id in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on SourceID in source and id in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an id in the target exists but the same SourceID doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View comment_type_reference_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build comment_type_reference_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW source_reference_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.id IS NULL
        THEN T3.SourceReferenceID
        ELSE NULL
    END AS SourceReferenceID, -- surrogate key
    T1.id AS SourceID,
    T1.value AS Value,
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID, -- NOT CORRECT
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat( IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), IFNULL(T1.value,'.'))) AS RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.id = T3.SourceID AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), IFNULL(T1.value,'.'))) <> T3.RowID
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.SourceID IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.id IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData,
    T3.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM source_reference_grouped T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Checkmark" = T2.Description
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_source_reference_dim T3 ON T1.id = T3.SourceID and T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    (-- flags new data        
        (CASE
            WHEN T1.ID = T3.SourceID AND md5(concat( IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), IFNULL(T1.value,'.'))) <> T3.RowID
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.SourceID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' ) OR
        -- flags deleted data
        (CASE
            WHEN T1.id IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END = 'Y' )
    )

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **SXO_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View SXO_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW source_reference_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select
    SourceReferenceID,
    SourceID,
    Value, 
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From source_reference_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    SourceReferenceID,
    SourceID,
    Value,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_source_reference_dim
WHERE Value IN (SELECT Value FROM source_reference_dim_new WHERE SourceID IS NULL)
AND IsActive = 'Y';

# View SXO_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. SxO from Personal Characteristics), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.SXO_dim is updated

%%sql

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_source_reference_dim AS Target
USING source_reference_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.SourceID = Target.SourceID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.SXO_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new SXOID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_source_reference_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SourceReferenceID NULLS LAST) AS SourceReferenceID,
    SourceID,
    Value, 
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_source_reference_dim;
